WorkItem.ClosedComment: We usually do a refresh from armory/wowhead before releases, but not always. My suggestion would be if you see one thing wrong best to refresh all to be sure.
WorkItem.Description: Rawr has always calculated the talisman of Resurgence at about 463dps, until 4.3.8 where it has almost dropped off the list at 157dps. Is this a new calculation issue, which is correct?

Comments.Message: We'll need to see your character xml where this happens. Are you sure this is without any changes in your settings or gear? Does it have the proc still listed?

no settings or gear changes.. load same .xml file into 4.3.7 and its good.. load into 4.3.8 and its wonky. It appears the proc is not listed, did a 'refresh item data from armory' and it is listing correct now.. ty :)
Should I refresh all item data from the armory? (considerable time sink) or re-download RAWR?
